alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 12:00PM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Quad Cities IA IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa... Mississippi River at Dubuque LD11 affecting Jo Daviess and Dubuque Counties. .Warm temperatures have melted the snowpack and river flows are increasing. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Dubuque LD11. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday afternoon and continue rising to 17.3 feet Friday morning. Additional rises are expected thereafter. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued tonight.
